paper_abstract: A NEW STATIC-ANALYSIS FRAMEWORK HELPS SECURITY ANALYSTS DETECT VULNERABLE APPLICATIONS. THE AUTHORS DESIGNED AN APP PROPERTY GRAPH (APG), CONDUCTED GRAPH TRAVERSALS OVER APGS, AND REDUCED THE MANUAL-VERIFICATION WORKLOAD. THEY IMPLEMENTED THE FRAMEWORK IN VULHUNTER AND MODELED FIVE TYPES OF VULNERABILITIES. RESULTS SHOWED THAT OF 557 RANDOMLY COLLECTED APPS WITH AT LEAST 1 MILLION INSTALLATIONS, 375 APPS (67.3 PERCENT) HAD AT LEAST ONE VULNERABILITY.
paper_title: VULHUNTER: TOWARD DISCOVERING VULNERABILITIES IN ANDROID APPLICATIONS
